datingapp.backend

Class CreateAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • datingapp.backend.CreateAccount

  • public class CreateAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    creates an account for the Person object (user) that wanted to create an account (called from CreateAccountWindow.java)
    Author:
    Achintya

      creates an account for a Person (user) using the data passed in as the parameters, but only if everything is valid

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public Person isValid(java.lang.String firstName,
                      java.lang.String lastName,
                      java.lang.String email,
                      java.lang.String password,
                      java.lang.String confirmPassword,
                      java.lang.String age,
                      java.lang.String gender,
                      java.lang.String sexuality,
                      boolean single,
                      java.lang.String bio,
                      java.io.File profilePic)
               throws InvalidFirstNameException,
                      InvalidLastNameException,
                      InvalidAgeException,
                      PasswordMismatchException,
                      InvalidPasswordException,
                      java.io.IOException,
                      InvalidEmailAddressException,
                      InvalidProfilePictureException,
                      BioWordLengthException,
                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                      java.sql.SQLException
        creates an account for a Person (user) using the data passed in as the parameters, but only if everything is valid
        Parameters:
        firstName - the user's first name
        lastName - the user's last name
        email - the user's email
        password - the user's password
        confirmPassword - the user's password (for confirmation)
        age - the user's age
        gender - the user's gender
        sexuality - the user's sexual orientation
        single - the user's availability
        bio - the user's bio
        profilePic - the user's profile picture
        Returns:
        a Person with the correct
        Throws:
        InvalidFirstNameException - in case the user's first name is invalid
        InvalidLastNameException - in case the user's last name is invalid
        InvalidAgeException - in case the user's age is invalid or under the limit
        PasswordMismatchException - in case the user's password is invalid
        InvalidPasswordException - in case the user's passwords do not match up when being created
        java.io.IOException - in case of issues when converting the profile picture to a Blob in the DATABASE
        InvalidEmailAddressException - in case the email the user entered in is invalid
        InvalidProfilePictureException - in case the profile picture the user wants to use is invalid
        BioWordLengthException - in case the length of the bio the user entered in is over the limit of 350 chars
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - in case the classes of any of the parameters are not found
        java.sql.SQLException - in case the connection to the DATABASE fails
